title: .11 Make It Viral
description: The people behind @buzzfeed and @nba discuss how analytics help them decide what to post and when, plus the behind-the-scenes story of how Buzzfeed got that dress to go viral.
itunes:title: .11 Make It Viral
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
itunes:subtitle: The people behind @buzzfeed and @nba discuss how analytics help them decide what to post and when, plus the behind-the-scenes story of how Buzzfeed got that dress to go viral.
